attributes.action: petition councils to reduce council taxes to compensate householders for the extra fuel-burning trips they are forced to make to tips/recycling centres, due to the Government’s unpopular Alternate Weekly Collection (AWC) waste scheme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Glaring flaws in the UK Government’s detested and unhygienic Alternate Weekly Collection (AWC) waste scheme are seeing thousands of residents out of pocket. Families are being forced to make extra fuel-burning trips to tips and recycling outlets to dispose of their excess waste that councils cannot/will not handle. We are calling on the PM to petition councils for a fair 'Council Tax Reduction' for the trips to the tip we have to now make.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
